overview: The concert footage was filmed May 25, 2003, at Sellersville Theater using 6 cameras, HD, 16 mm, BETA SP. The audio was recorded digitally live with 32 channels and mixed by Brett Kull. Echolyn has been creating music for 15 years. They have composed and produced over 80 songs. They have gained an international audience and always working on new and pertinent material. Texas Dust Swingin' the Axe The Cheese Stands Alone A Little Nonsense 1729 Broadway My Dear Wormwood As the World Never the Same Brittany Mei Shades
title: Echolyn - Stars & Gardens
